text: Robert E. Rose (October 7, 1939 - February 14, 2022) was an American politician. He was a Democrat. He was the 26th Lieutenant Governor of Nevada from 1975 to 1979 and was the Democratic nominee for Governor of Nevada in 1978. Rose died on February 14, 2022 at the age of 82.Former Nevada chief justice, ex-Lt. Gov. title: Robert E. Rose
